snippet.title: The Rum Diary 2011 Film | Johnny Depp  + Amber Heard
snippet.description:
What's your review of the 2011 film Rum Diary with Johnny Depp and Amber Heard? [OPEN FOR LINKS AND FACTS!] #TheRumDiary #RumDiary #JohnnyDepp #AmberHeard Do you want to watch the Rum Diary? Did you enjoy the full movie or just parts of it? Scroll down for more information!

My novels: https://www.amazon.co.uk/Amy-McLean/e/B00LM2Y9EI?ref=sr_ntt_srch_lnk_1&qid=1576877686&sr=8-1      

My playlists: http://www.youtube.com/user/TVCriticAmy/playlists       

Website: https://www.mcleanamy.co.uk/       

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Amy-McLean/158138850922200       

Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/McLeanAmy/       

Amy McLean

ABOUT THE RUM DIARY 2011

If you know anywhere to stream or watch the Rum Diary full movie online free (and legally!), feel free to share this information!

Plot from IMDb: "American journalist Paul Kemp takes on a freelance job in Puerto Rico for a local newspaper during the 1960s and struggles to find a balance between island culture and the expatriates who live there."

Alternative titles (from Letterboxd): Rhum Express, Diário de um Jornalista Bêbado, O Diário a Rum, Los diarios del ron, 醉後型男日記, Diario De Un Seductor, 莱姆酒日记

(The Rum Diary trailer can be found on IMDb.)

Directed by Bruce Robinson
Produced by Johnny Depp, Graham King, Christi Dembrowski, Anthony Rhulen, Robert Kravis, Tim Headington
Screenplay by Bruce Robinson
Based on The Rum Diary by Hunter S. Thompson
Music by Christopher Young
Cinematography: Dariusz Wolski
Edited by Carol Littleton
Production Companies: GK Films, Infinitum Nihil, Film Engine
Distributed by FilmDistrict (US)
Release date: October 13, 2011 (Los Angeles), October 28, 2011 (United States)
Running time: 120 minutes
Budget: $45 million
Box office: $23.9 million

Cast and Characters:
Johnny Depp as Paul Kemp
Aaron Eckhart as Hal Sanderson
Michael Rispoli as Bob Sala
Amber Heard as Chenault
Richard Jenkins as Edward J. Lotterman
Giovanni Ribisi as Moburg
Amaury Nolasco as Segurra
Marshall Bell as Donovan
Bill Smitrovich as Art Zimburger
Julian Holloway as Wolsey
Karen Austin as Mrs. Zimburger
Jason Smith as Davey
Karimah Westbrook as Papa Nebo
Jorge Antares as drug dealer
